meanings.definition: A type of traditional boat used in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The prahus sailed gracefully on the calm river.
meanings.sent2: Many fishermen rely on prahus for their daily catch.
meanings.sent3: The prahus decided to have a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The prahus lined up like colorful ducks in the water.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the prahus fascinated the tourists.

meanings.sent1: We saw several prahus docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The prahus were beautifully decorated with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The prahus seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The prahus stood out among the other boats in the fleet.
meanings.sent5: The prahus bobbed gently in the water, a sight to behold.
